name: Pizza Hot Dip
description: Skip the slices without any pizza party FOMO. This hot ‘n cheesy dip is bursting with classic pizza ingredients like mushrooms, basil, and bell peppers—no chopping required. It’s the ultimate appy for those last minute, “oops, I forgot I have to bring something” party moments.  Have this prepped and ready to serve in under 10 minutes.
preparation:
MICROWAVE

  1. In a large bowl, combine hot dip mix, cream cheese, and mayo. Spoon into Rectangular Steamer or microwave-safe baking dish. 
  2. Cover; microwave on high 3 min, stirring halfway through. 
  3. Top with mozzarella cheese and peperoni slices, if using. Microwave uncovered for 2 min, or until cheese has melted. 

OVEN

  1. Preheat oven to 350° F.
  2. In a large bowl, combine hot dip mix, cream cheese, and mayo. Spoon into Rectangular Steamer or baking dish. 
  3. Top with mozzarella cheese and pepperoni slices, if using. Bake, uncovered, 15 min.
